    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This method is always called at the beginning of the program. Depending on the arguments calls different methods.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • getPersonBasedOnWeight

        private static void getPersonBasedOnWeight(java.lang.String[] args)
        This method is called when we want to select person basing on weight. After the required argument are passed to the XMLManager method that returns the matching results. Obtained results are printed on the console
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments passed at the beginning of the program. The selection is based on a giving argument

      • getHeight

        private static void getHeight(java.lang.String[] args)
        This function prints on the console the height related to the given ID or FirstName and LastName. This is done by calling the method of XMLManager class.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments passed at the beginning of the program. They can contain the ID or the First and Last name of the person

      • getWeight

        private static void getWeight(java.lang.String[] args)
        This function prints on the console the weight related to the given ID or FirstName and LastName. This is done by calling the method of XMLManager class.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments passed at the beginning of the program. They can contain the ID or the First and Last name of the person

      • printPeople

        public static void printPeople(java.util.List<Person> list)
        This method is called after the UnMarshalling from XML. Then start printing the information about people
        Parameters:
        list - the list of people to print

      • getHealthProfile

        public static void getHealthProfile(java.lang.String[] args)
        This method when it's called checks the arguments and the calls the getHealthProfile method of the XMLManager class. After that prints the results on the console.
        Parameters:
        args - the parameter passed at the beginning to the main

      • printUnMarshalling

        public static void printUnMarshalling(java.util.List<Person> list)
        This method prints the Person list with some details
        Parameters:
        list - obtained by unmarshalling files

      • printResults

        public static void printResults(org.w3c.dom.NodeList results)
        This method prints results obtained from the selection based on weight
        Parameters:
        results - is the nodelist obtained from the xquery
